import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import {ShopContext} from '../../Context/ShopContext' import removeicon from '../Assets/removeicon.png' export const CartItems = () => { const {all_knifes, cartItems, removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_knifes.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id] > 0) { return

{e.name}

${e.knife_price}

{e.knife_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart()}} alt="" />
} })}
) } export default CartItems
